title: A Record-Breaking Campaign for Afternoon Tea | Torchbox

metadata.description: Read about our strategy for the 2023 Afternoon Tea campaign that raised the most amount of money to date, beating the previous year’s total by 49%, generating a total of 11,379 registrants.
